OOC: is the ark moving?

In response to the message received from the Ark by an unknown, 
bot, Astroblast says, Start Message: "Ark, this is Astroblast, 
decepticon second in command, prepare to be slagged 
mercilessly." :End Message. He then chuckles evily. 

"A uselessness that only pathetic maximals could achieve. We will 
slag them all soon enough. Here we go, approaching weapon 
range, where do you want to be dropped off Commanders, he says 
refering to Killfest and Motormaster?



On 30 Jan 2001, at 15:33, Yanshosh@... wrote:

> ::Killfest::
> 
> "Maximals," Killfest replies with contempt to Motormaster's first 
> question, taking a seat. He once again accessed the data he got from 
> the Council base's computer. "The Ark used to serve as the Maximal 
> base, but the pathetic Maximals couldn't protect it. After numerous 
> attacks, it finally fell at the hands of a group called the Trainers. 
> Some Maximals repaired it and launched it into space, probably to 
> protect it."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > Motormaster steps past Killfest and sits down in the commanding 
> chair. He
> > opens up his energon receiver and puts a cube in. "So who are these 
> enemies
> > we will be fighting" he says leaning back in the metalic chair, 
> watching
> > the map display of outerspace. "and how did the Ark get in 
> outerspace?" he
> > ask
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
